column3: These comments are pretty minimal. What does "key prefix" mean?
I agree with @sipa here, adding documentation here would be very welcome, but this is the same message for all of them and it doesn't really add much, imo.

@sipa With the `key prefix` I meant that this is not the full leveldb key (like `DB_BEST_BLOCK = 'B'`) but only the prefix of it. For instance, to get the coin, we lookup by this key `DB_COIN + COutPoint`\n\nLet me then add a full description to every key and explain how it's being used.
I'm closing this for now, please open a new PR (or tell me to re-open this one) when you start work on this again.
